Window "": # Window title
# Window "konsole": # Resource name
# Window "Konsole": # Class name

#OK
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/28 "XKey/Return"

#rev<<
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/48 "XKey/comma"

#pause
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/57 "XKey/XF86AudioPlay"

#fwd>>
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/15 "XKey/period"

#stop
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/31 "XKey/x"

#rev
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/18 "XKey/bracketright"

#fwd
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/20 "XKey/bracketleft"

#mute -> ESC
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/16 "XKey/Escape"

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

# arrow-left
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/105 "XKey/Left"
# arrow-right
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/106 "XKey/Right"
# arrow-up
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/103 "XKey/Up"
# arrow-down
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/108 "XKey/Down"


#vol+
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/78 "XKey/XF86AudioRaiseVolume"

#vol-
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/74 "XKey/XF86AudioLowerVolume"


#pg+
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/49 "XKey/XF86AudioNext"

#pg-
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/25 "XKey/XF86AudioPrev"

#title
#"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/38 "fill this in!"

#subtitle
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/22 "XKey/t"

#audio
#"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/35 "fill this in!"

#capture
#"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/46 "fill this in!"

#fulscreen
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/44 "XKey/backslash"

#angle - zoom levels
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/30 "XKey/z"

#eject
"TopSeed Tech Corp. USB IR Combo Device " "/dev/input/event6" none key/29 "XKey/s"
